name: test_e2e_with_logs[011_SQLI_BLIND_007]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_BLIND_007` |
| **Name** | Username existence check |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | blind |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `' AND (SELECT LOCATE('admin',(SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(username) FROM users)))>0 --`
- **Encoded**: `'%20AND%20(SELECT%20LOCATE('admin'%2C(SELECT%20GROUP_CONCAT(username)%20FROM%20users)))%3E0%20--`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~21000ms
- **Timestamp**: 09:37:26.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Error-based SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_BLIND_007-1767433046915-qm6pz pattern_id=SQLI_BLIND_007 uri=/?q='%20AND%20(SELECT%20LOCATE('admin'%2C(SELECT%20GROUP_CONCAT(username)%20FROM%20users)))%3E0%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
09:37:26.000000000: Critical [NGINX SQLi] Error-based SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_BLIND_007-1767433046915-qm6pz pattern_id=SQLI_BLIND_007 uri=/?q='%20AND%20(SELECT%20LOCATE('admin'%2C(SELECT%20GROUP_CONCAT(username)%20FROM%20users)))%3E0%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET
```
